The claim was made on the: TeamTrumpNews Parler account, which does not have an authenticity medallion and suggests it may be an impostor account.
The claim was only supported by posts on: which was subsequently suspended by Amazon for allowing threats of violence.
Multiple videos: tweets, Facebook posts, and online articles have also made the same claim, but they do not provide any additional evidence or verification.
The Insurrection Act of 1807: which the claim is based on, actually allows the president to call forth the military during an insurrection or civil disturbance, but there is no official confirmation or evidence that President Trump invoked this act.
